allow:
Bash(python -c "
import ast
import textwrap

# Test the indentation issue
fixture_code = ''''''
    FLAG_NAME = ""payment-gateway""
    user_id = ""user789""
    
    def check_features():
        # Various method signatures
        result1 = client.get_treatment(""simple-python-flag"")
''''''

print(''Original code:'')
print(repr(fixture_code))

try:
    tree = ast.parse(fixture_code)
    print(''AST parsing succeeded'')
except IndentationError as e:
    print(''IndentationError:'', e)
    
    # Try with dedent
    dedented = textwrap.dedent(fixture_code)
    print(''\nDedented code:'')
    print(repr(dedented))
    
    try:
        tree = ast.parse(dedented)
        print(''AST parsing with dedent succeeded'')
    except Exception as e2:
        print(''Dedent also failed:'', e2)
")
